content:
Hi,

Is it possible to do a _revinclude where i get a provenance for a specific resource based on the activity attribute?

Something like this:
BASE/ConceptMap/?id=6321114e-223a-4469-9ab8-7d3b23f55174&_revinclude=Provenance:target:activity=http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/provenance-activity-type%7CCREATE

Thanks
Activity is not a search parameter for Provenance (in R4). But if it were to be a supported search parameter the syntax looks legit to me.
good thing to request of Provenance. Please enter a change request asking for the added search parameter on activity.
_revInclude doesn't support filtering on the included content
